name: Social Media CATastrophy
description: In this top-down-shooter the player takes the role of a new aspiring influencer who tries to get closer to her/his idol. This is not easy as haters will try to hinder you from gathering a following by shooting negative comments at you. By the way, did I mention that you are a cat and literally must fight your way through to achieve your sought-after fame. For this a variety of weapons are at your disposal to blast away your haters with positive vibes.
